title: How to Log Out of Viber on iPhone or iPad: Quick Guide

steps.title: Open your iPhone or iPad’s Settings.
steps.content: Open your iPhone or iPad’s Settings. It’s the typically found on the home screen.

steps.title: Tap iPhone Storage.
steps.content: Tap iPhone Storage . It’s near the middle of the menu.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Viber.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Viber . Look for the purple chat bubble icon with a phone receiver inside.

steps.title: Tap Offload App.
steps.content: Tap Offload App . A confirmation message will appear, letting you know that your data will remain intact when the app is removed.

steps.title: Tap Offload App to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Offload App to confirm. This signs you out of Viber and removes the app from your iPhone or iPad. To sign back in, return to this screen and tap Reinstall App . You’ll be signed back into Viber as soon as the app is reinstalled.
